Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:42:05
Folder: CB58V9R - debeers opens in dubai mall, sol3mates 320s launch, ngp spotlight
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CB58V9R_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-21 13:12
Subject: DeBeers opens in Dubai Mall, SOL3MATES 320s launch, NGP Spotlight
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

DE BEERS OPENS FLAGSHIP STORE IN DUBAI MALL

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/fee82e26309a0c68f602550db2934e2c1375962457.jpeg> 	

We have added a new partnership to our Eyeware, Watches & Jewelry portfolio! Our partnership with DeBeers represents an exciting expansion into the UAE for the luxury Jewellery House and a key milestone in our Group’s strategy to strengthen its position as a key player in the jewellery sector.

A leading force in contemporary jewellery, De Beers takes design inspiration from the House’s roots in Southern Africa, enriched with London’s creative flair. Nature is De Beers’ eternal muse: from Namibia’s golden dunes to Botswana’s lush Okavango Delta and South Africa’s diverse ecosystem. 

The new Dubai flagship showcases one-of-a-kind High Jewellery, crafted to enhance the beauty of the Earth’s most magnificent diamonds.

chunks.text:
The launch of the SOL3MATES 320s

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=743&user=10620> 	
Introducing a new chapter in our journey: the launch of the SOL3MATES 320s — a sneaker crafted to celebrate versatility, everyday motion, and self-expression. Level Shoes will be the very first retailer to carry the SOL3MATES 320s. A perfect partnership, rooted in a shared passion for innovation, culture, and craftsmanship. Step into the future with us. Shop Now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=744&user=10620> 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=743&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	
Faisal Alzaraee | NGP Spotlight 
"Hello, I’m Faisal Alzaraee!
I graduated from the American University of Sharjah with a Bachelor's degree in Business Management & HR.
I started my journey with Chalhoub Group’s National Graduate Programme in digital marketing, working on paid ads, SEO, and CRM. While the experience was enjoyable and helped me develop analytical and strategic skills, I found myself drawn more towards HR and talent acquisition."
Read more about Faisal here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=745&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=745&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=746&user=10620>
